title: Nursing associate
change: Retired. End-point assessment plan revised. The funding band for this standard has been reviewer and remains at £15,000 (14.05.2021).
overviewOfRole: Delivering high quality, compassionate care under the direction of a registered nurse.
reviewDetails: this apprenticeship will be reviewed in accordance with our change request policy.
clusterDescription: Provide direct patient contact and high quality care with in-depth knowledge of the factors influencing health and ill-health using specialist expertise
